description: Shifting conditions, mixed terrain, fully loaded pack - on technical approaches you need confidence and comfort. The light, fast Konseal FL 2 is nimble, supportive, and made to handle varied conditions and demanding trails. Gore-Tex provides proven waterproof, breathable protection, and the leather upper adds durability. Its Vibram® Megagrip outsole provides a secure hold - wet or dry - and the TPU midfoot chassis and raised perimeter sidewalls provide stability on shifting surfaces.
name: Arcteryx Konseal FL 2 Leather GTX - Mens
